author: m.kalinin
content:
It is easier to take existing beacon chain and mainnet client codebases, modify them and implement communication channel between these clients than building a monolith either from scratch or from existing code. This separation of concerns allows each team to do what they can do best as both parts of the stack represented by highly sophisticated and optimised software.
Long term we might see new clients implementing both parts of the stack in a single piece of software.
